code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Search(){const[input,setInput]=useState("");const[pokemon,setPokemon]=useState(null);const fetchPokemon=async()=>{const response=await fetch("https://pokeapi.co/api/v2/pokemon/".concat(input.toLowerCase()));const data=await response.json();setPokemon(data);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"search",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Search a Pokemon"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"search-box",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Enter Pokemon name...",value:input,onChange:e=>setInput(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:fetchPokemon,children:"Search"})]}),pokemon&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"pokemon-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:pokemon.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:pokemon.sprites.front_default,alt:pokemon.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Height: ",pokemon.height]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Weight: ",pokemon.weight]})]})]});}export default Search;
